title: This is what lungs infected with COVID-19 look like
description: Doctors at George Washington University Hospital are raising awareness about the serious damage COVID-19 can cause on the lungs of individuals. The hospital posted a video of a 3D model from a CT scan that shows, in yellow, the extent to which the disease has…
